name: MTLDepthStencilDescriptor
desc: An object that configures new MTLDepthStencilState objects.

items.name: var depthCompareFunction: MTLCompareFunction
items.desc: The comparison that is performed between a fragmentâ€™s depth value and the depth value in the attachment, which determines whether to discard the fragment.

items.name: var isDepthWriteEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether depth values can be written to the depth attachment.

items.name: var backFaceStencil: MTLStencilDescriptor!
items.desc: The stencil descriptor for back-facing primitives.

items.name: var frontFaceStencil: MTLStencilDescriptor!
items.desc: The stencil descriptor for front-facing primitives.

items.name: var label: String?
items.desc: A string that identifies this object.
